Class Scenario.ScenarioBuilder

java.lang.Object
dev.royalcore.api.scenario.Scenario.ScenarioBuilder
Enclosing class:
Scenario
public static class Scenario.ScenarioBuilder extends Object
Builder for Scenario instances, providing a fluent configuration API.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ScenarioBuilder(net.kyori.adventure.text.Component sname)
    Creates a new builder for a scenario with the given name.

    • ScenarioBuilder

      public ScenarioBuilder(net.kyori.adventure.text.Component sname)
      Creates a new builder for a scenario with the given name.
      Parameters:
      sname - the display name of the scenario

  • Method Details

    • items

      public Scenario.ScenarioBuilder items(Consumer<ItemConsumer> consumer)
      Configures scenario items using the provided consumer.
      Parameters:
      consumer - a consumer that receives the internal ItemConsumer
      Returns:
      this builder for chaining

      public Scenario.ScenarioBuilder onStart(Consumer<Runnable> onStart)

      Returns:
      this builder for chaining

    • onStart

      public Scenario.ScenarioBuilder onStart(Runnable runnable)

      Parameters:
      runnable - the runnable to invoke when the scenario starts

      Returns:

    • build

      public Scenario build()
      Builds the Scenario instance from the accumulated configuration.

      If no name is provided, a placeholder scenario is created and an error is logged.

      Returns:
      a new Scenario instance
